MOSTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 60S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY

HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
